Articles.Content: In rehabilitation after getting krakenified and shot out of the solar system. Thank the altf12 menu to get him back into kerbin orbit. Then he used his jet pack to deorbit. He landed on his head and survived. He's a hacker.
In career mode back at the KSC, complaining that someone "took his ride".

Hauling a bunch of newbie engineers and scientists out to Minmus and back in preparation for the new science lab that is getting ready to launch to Minmus and along the way picking up a pilot that got himself stranded on Minmus' south pole.

Edited October 28, 2016 by TerminalV

Sitting in LKO on a 4 kerbal rescue mission, waiting to pick up his first rescuee.

 

Since his rerendezvous was taking so long, I also launched the first ISRU enabled exploration craft/cruise ship destined to head to the Mun, Minmus and beyond(With Val, Bill, Bob, and lots of tourists who only expected to get orbital), forgetting he was up there, there are enough empty cruise ship seats to pick up everyone in orbit(except Jeb) before heading to the Mun for refueling...

My previous career Jeb lives in the astronaut complex.

My current Jeb died when I clumsily yawed into an uncontrollabe position during reentry.  I was eating a snack (wasabi almonds!) as it descended through 20000 meters, so my love of salty snacks cost Jeb his life.  

 

Edited October 28, 2016 by Jonfliesgoats
Stranded on the Mün.
We're is your Jedediah? I know he loves stranding himself on planets  or in orbit... I know I've rescued mine 4 times so far! I am curious. Respond below!

This is a good idea for a thread, @Leftykap. Such a good idea that we already have one. Your thread has been merged into it. 

My Jeb is currently at KSC, since I've been concentrating on probe missions.

En route to Duna with the rest of the orange shirts (and a few extra Max Pecks to fulfill additional crew requirements) as part of my first manned mission outside of Kerbin's SOI, although I think my mission to Eve will arrive first despite being launched later.
Sitting at KSC, twiddling his thumbs.
Driving a rover around on Minmus with the help of the Bon Voyage mod.

Just came back from a Duna-Ike mission with Bill and another Kerbal. They did not land anywhere though, but the remaining kerbal did land on Ike (the pod only had space for 1 so I decided to send the scientist.

As for the other 2 main kerbals, both dead. Bob died crushed by a service bay, Val died when she stepped out of the capsule during reentry (not a good idea)

Temporarily grounded from all space-flight. MunBase1 landed last night; ScienceLab, SatCom, ISRU 1&2, The Atlantis, Emiko (How do you pronounce that, @Just Jim? I'm pronouncing it "Ehm-ee-k-oh" but you're the author), and the Apollo Emergency Escape vessels, and the 4 "M-250" Rovers are going up today. Jeb isn't getting his mitts on any of these pieces of machinery. Unless he goes up on a Hermes Personnel Transport vessel
Currently on EVA on the Mun. First stranded Kerbal since 2014. He even lost his ship, as he had to escape before ground to survive. Now he's waiting for proper technology that could bring him back.

24 minutes ago, DarkOwl57 said:

How do you pronounce that, @Just Jim? I'm pronouncing it "Ehm-ee-k-oh" but you're the author

ehm-E-koh 

For the exact pronunciation, watch the original 1954 Godzilla next chance you get. Emiko is the main female character in the movie, and who mine is named after.

And to bring this back on topic...

My Jeb, Val, Bob and Bill just finally landed from an almost 4 year journey out to Duna and back!!!  Gonna be a big party tonight!!!

In my first save, when I first successfully landed on Mun, I had not enough fuel for a return trip. I sent a rescue ship which did not have enough fuel after landing to make it all the way back. I then sent a rescue for the rescue and knowing nothing about orbital rendezvous ended up with Jeb floating around Kerbin in his EVA suit.

In my most recent save, he's waiting for automated flight testing to certify a rocket so he can be the first kerbal to orbit Gael.
At the moment, he is hanging around in the Astronaut Complex

my jebediah, he just got assigned for his first mission for my Kerbinorbiters space program!

so hes just training in the soyuz
MY Jeb is on the mun, waiting for the correct time to ascent toward orion.

Alone, in a mk1 lander can, no snacks, a single solar panel and no antenna, in a highly inclined, highly eccentrical orbit.

Of Eeloo.
Hes (and the other 3) currently still on vacation on a yacht in the water inbetween the KSC and the Island Airfield. Still planning that manned Minnmus mission!
Jebediah... Oh oh... He's dead :v in Sandbox
Dead. Died on his second flight in my Career save, but is alive and well on a LKO space station in my Sandbox save.

On 4/15/2017 at 2:11 PM, joacobanfield said:

Alone, in a mk1 lander can, no snacks, a single solar panel and no antenna, in a highly inclined, highly eccentrical orbit.

Well that's okay! Just send up a recovery-

 

On 4/15/2017 at 2:11 PM, joacobanfield said:

Of Eeloo.

Vehicle.......... ah

Quote

Where is your jebediah kerman?

Drinking old coffee at the ksc while raging to Bill that he should fix the coffee machine.
